name: oh to be a ghost bringing a scarf to my beloved
name_original: oh to be a ghost bringing a scarf to my beloved
description:
oh to be a ghost bringing a scarf to my beloved.

a cute little mostly point-and-click game about ghosts in love. your partner is cold. bring a scarf to them <3

made for valentine's day 2022! hehe.

click, or use space/enter to navigate the cutscenes. use your mouse to direct blue ghost and don't hit the sads!

if it lags a lot, maybe the downloads would work?

this game was made on impulse the day before valentine's day, completed in approximately 8 hours :)

everything in this game is created by bucketfish, including the sounds and the font.

who will be the red ghost to my blue ghost?
